name: Auckland War Memorial Museum
openingHours: Aperto tutti i giorni 10-17 (giorno di Natale chiuso). MƒÅori cultura prestazioni 3 volte al giorno - 11, 12, 1.30 pm.  Visite guidate di lasciare l'atrio anteriore tutti i giorni alle 10.30 e 14.

offers.description: No donation is requested from visitors from the Auckland region. A donation of $10 per adult is suggested for all non-Aucklanders and international residents. Charges may apply for special exhibitions and programmes. Aucklanders, please bring your I AM AUCKLAND MUSEUM card or proof of residence. Children aged 15 years and under are free.
